name: MSIT Corona Virus Live Update Widgets
author: Md.Omar Faruqe

sections.description:
This MSIT Corona Virus Live Update Widgets is basically showing world and Country wise Corona Virus update Result. After install this plugin you will get a new “MSIT Corona Virus Live Update Widgets” widgets on your wordpress admin panel under appearance menu. Then just use it and enjoy free of cost your wordpress blog or website. You can add this widget on your wordpress sidebar or any widget area.

Special Thanks

I want to thanks who inspired me to develop a wordpress plugin. I am also want to thank MY SOFT IT Team members for their support.

Current API infomation

NovelCOVID/API

API website: https://api.focustech24.com/

License: http://api.focustech24.com/license

World Endpoint: http://api.focustech24.com/Globals
Country Endpoint: http://api.focustech24.com/Country

Privacy policy: http://api.focustech24.com/privacy-policy/

Please read the Privacy Policy of this API before you download and install this plugin in your website.
sections.installation:
1. At first Upload this plugin(unziped) to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory “msit-coronavirus-live-update-widgets.zip” from your wordpress admin panel as a plugin
  2. Activate the plugin through the “Plugins” menu in WordPress
  3. Now go to the WordPress Widget area and then use “MSIT Corona Virus Live Update Widget” widget as your widget area.

Add this Widget

  1. Install “MSIT Corona Virus Live Update Widget” through the WordPress admin menu of Appearance and then use the widget.

Add this widget sidebar

Add this widget select box set your own country
sections.faq:
May i use this front to back widget in my premium wordpress theme?

Yes, you can.

Can I use this to both the sidebar?

Yes, You can.

If i see any error how can solve it?

You just send our mail info@my-softit.com .

Can you upgrade this plugin in my own requirment?

Yes, You just send our mail info@my-softit.com .

The option page let you choose which country to focus on.
